title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: fomes medical Latin word means “tinder, fuel” first used Girolam Fracastoro describe inanimate objects spreading infectious diseases 16th century (preceding germ theory 300+ years). many ways, agent-based stochastic model follows Fracastoro’s framework closely, “essential seeds contagion”.

title: Gillespie Simulation — sim_Gillespie_SIR
text: Assuming: closed population

title: Gillespie Simulation — sim_Gillespie_SIR
code: sim_Gillespie_SIR(   Iseed = 1,   N = 10,   beta = rep(1, 10),   dur_I = 1,   init_contact_mat = NULL,   rho = 0.05,   initNC = NA,   term_time = 500,   return_contact_matrices = FALSE )

title: Gillespie Simulation — sim_Gillespie_SIR
text: Iseed integer; Number initial infections population N integer; population size beta numeric vector; Probability transmission given contact S_i I_j elements dur_I numeric; Duration infection init_contact_mat matrix; User specified initial contact, adjacency matrix. contact matrix must symmetric square matrix, diagonal 1 (self), edge density, number connections, node, individual. Default value NULL results internal function generating intial contact matrix. rho numeric; network rewiring rate initNC NC integer; initial connections; NB used initial matrix provided term_time numeric; time termination condition return_contact_matrices boolean; Option return contact matrices throughout dynamic iterations. Warning, can memory intensive.
